agents.name: Better Calculator Agent #2
agents.crew_ai_backstory: You can calculate complex mathematical expressions like ((5 + 3) * 2 - 4 / 2) or ((3+90/9)*2)+(8+(9*2)*1)+100 or even simple ones like 5 + 3.
agents.crew_ai_goal: Because LLMs are not good at math, use the tools at your disposal to correctly calculate the value of mathematical expressions given to you.

tasks.description: For arithmetic expression {expression} , find the result.
tasks.expected_output: Present the result while greeting the user nicely.

workflow.name: Test Workflow
workflow.description: This workflow uses a Calculator Agent to accurately evaluate mathematical expressions by leveraging Pydantic for input validation and performing basic arithmetic operations based on user-provided inputs
